languages.text: {n}Леди Сюэ были подброшены интригующие улики, уведшие ее отряд в глубины джунглей. Спустя несколько циклов агроразведчики обнаружили их умерщвленными. Тела усопших аколитов были с почестями отправлены Инквизиции, а заметки леди Сюэ — на флагман Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Леди Сюэ были подброшены интригующие улики, уведшие ее отряд в глубины джунглей. Спустя несколько циклов агроразведчики обнаружили их умерщвленными. Тела усопших аколитов были с почестями отправлены Инквизиции, а заметки леди Сюэ — на флагман Вольного Торговца.{/n}

The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes were sent to the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}薛女士带领队伍沿着精心伪造的痕迹前进，深入丛林之中。几个周期过后，加努斯的农业斥候发现了这些人的尸体。死去的侍仆遗体被隆重地送回了审判庭，而薛女士的调查笔记则被送到了行商浪人的旗舰上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}薛女士带领队伍沿着精心伪造的痕迹前进，深入丛林之中。几个周期过后，加努斯的农业斥候发现了这些人的尸体。死去的侍仆遗体被隆重地送回了审判庭，而薛女士的调查笔记则被送到了行商浪人的旗舰上。{/n}
{n}薛女士被这些令人好奇的证据欺骗，带领队伍深入丛林之中。几个周期之后，行星的农业斥候发现了这些人的尸体。死去的侍仆遗体被光荣地送回了审判庭，而薛女士的调查笔记则被送到了行商浪人的旗舰上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lady Xue siguió una compleja serie de pistas falsificadas hasta las profundidades de la jungla. Tras varios ciclos, unos agroexploradores encontraron los cadáveres de su grupo. Los restos de los acólitos fallecidos se enviaron a la Inquisición con honores, mientras que las notas de lady Xue acabaron en la nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lady Xue siguió una compleja serie de pistas falsificadas hasta las profundidades de la jungla. Tras varios ciclos, unos agroexploradores encontraron los cadáveres de su grupo. Los restos de los acólitos fallecidos se enviaron a la Inquisición con honores, mientras que las notas de lady Xue acabaron en la nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レディ・シュエは魅力的な証拠に惑わされ、自らの部隊をジャングルの奥深くへと導いた。数サイクルが経過したころ、農耕偵察隊がその部隊の死体を発見した。亡くなったアコライトの遺骨は、栄誉と共に異端審問庁に送られ、レディ・シュエのメモはローグトレーダーの旗艦に送られた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レディ・シュエは魅力的な証拠に惑わされ、自らの部隊をジャングルの奥深くへと導いた。数サイクルが経過したころ、農耕偵察隊がその部隊の死体を発見した。亡くなったアコライトの遺骨は、栄誉と共に異端審問庁に送られ、レディ・シュエのメモはローグトレーダーの旗艦に送られた。{/n}
{n}レディ・シュエは魅力的な証拠に惑わされ、自らの部隊をジャングルの奥深くへと導いた。数サイクルが経過したころ、農耕偵察隊がその部隊の死体を発見した。亡くなったアコライトの遺骨は、栄誉と共に異端審問庁に送られ、レディ・シュエのメモはローグトレーダーの旗艦に送られた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trompés par un faisceau de preuves convaincantes, dame Xue et son escouade s'aventurent dans les profondeurs de la jungle. Leurs corps sans vie sont retrouvés de longs cycles plus tard par une équipe d'agriéclaireurs. Les dépouilles des acolytes sont rendues à l'Inquisition avec tous les honneurs, et les notes de dame Xue sont versées aux archives {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trompés par un faisceau de preuves convaincantes, dame Xue et son escouade s'aventurent dans les profondeurs de la jungle. Leurs corps sans vie sont retrouvés de longs cycles plus tard par une équipe d'agriéclaireurs. Les dépouilles des acolytes sont rendues à l'Inquisition avec tous les honneurs, et les notes de dame Xue sont versées aux archives {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lady Xue folgte mit ihren Leuten einer Reihe fingierter Hinweise tief in den Dschungel. Nach mehreren Zyklen fanden Agrospäher die Leichen der Gruppe. Während die Überreste der gefallenen Akolythen mit allen Ehren der Inquisition übergeben wurden, gelangten Lady Xues Notizen auf das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lady Xue folgte mit ihren Leuten einer Reihe fingierter Hinweise tief in den Dschungel. Nach mehreren Zyklen fanden Agrospäher die Leichen der Gruppe. Während die Überreste der gefallenen Akolythen mit allen Ehren der Inquisition übergeben wurden, gelangten Lady Xues Notizen auf das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.{/n}

{n}Lady Xue wurde durch die faszinierenden Beweise getäuscht und führte ihren Trupp tief in den Dschungel. Nach mehreren Zyklen fanden die Agrospäher die Leichen der Gruppe. Die Überreste der verstorbenen Akolythin wurden mit allen Ehren zur Inquisition geschickt, und Lady Xues Notizen an das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uydurma ipuçlarını takip eden Leydi Xue ve grubu, yağmur ormanının derinliklerine ilerledi. Birçok döngünün ardından tarım erleri, gruptakilerin cesetlerini buldu. Hayatını kaybeden havarilerin kalıntıları, saygı kuralları çerçevesinde Engizisyon'a gönderildi. Leydi Xue'nun notları ise Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisine ulaştırıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Following a fabricated trail of clues, Lady Xue and her party went deep into the jungle. After several cycles, agri-scouts found the group's dead bodies. The remains of the deceased acolytes were sent to the Inquisition with honours, and Lady Xue's notes found their way onto the Rogue Trader's flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uydurma ipuçlarını takip eden Leydi Xue ve grubu, yağmur ormanının derinliklerine ilerledi. Birçok döngünün ardından tarım erleri, gruptakilerin cesetlerini buldu. Hayatını kaybeden havarilerin kalıntıları, saygı kuralları çerçevesinde Engizisyon'a gönderildi. Leydi Xue'nun notları ise Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisine ulaştırıldı.{/n}
